snippet.title: DISCO ELYSIUM - Collage Mode Launch Trailer (Official)
snippet.description:
In Collage Mode, players have full access to characters, environments, effects, and custom dialogue to create the screenshots that they have always desired.

Fabricate completely new dramas from unforgivable punch-ups to fruity yet forbidden kisses.

Now available for PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG. 

The update will be available on PlayStation®5 (PS5™), PlayStation®4 (PS4™), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and Nintendo Switch™ over the coming days.
